name: n/Thing
description:
Entry for the Legacy Mob Beginner Jam 14.

How do you solve a puzzle when you can't see any of the pieces?

An experimental game in which you must solve "simple" puzzles. The twist? You can't see where to go, what to do, or even your objective. Guide your little dice of light through darkness, test your memory, observation skills, and ear.

Can you reach the end?

CREDITS

A game by Enrique "Nebuchaddy" Lopez for the 5-Days LM0B Game Jam #14

Font & Icons - Kenney's free assets - https://kenney.nl/assets

Sound & Music - CC0 Licensed - https://freesound.org
